views.recover_password.subheader: Enter the email you used to sign up.
views.register.subheader: To begin creating your graph sign up now. Our main goal is to make chart creation simple and visually appealing. Complicated and boring charts should be a thing of the past. Whether you want to create a pie chart or a bar chart, we make it simple for you.
views.register.sign_up_success: The account was set up correctly
views.choose_chart_type.title: Select a chart type
views.choose_chart_type.subtitle: This application comes with built-in chart types like line, bar, radar, doughnut and pie, polar area, bubble, scatter
